titleInfo.title: f. Ir: ዳዊት - Dawit; f. 1r,8fb: መዝሙር፡ ዘዳዊት። - The Psalter of Dawit; and passim in the beginning of several Psalms

name.affiliation: University of Toronto Scarborough, Department of Historical and Cultural Studies, Canada
Uppsala University, Department of Linguistics and Philology, Sweden

name.namePart: f. 1r: Holy (monastery of) Mary Gundä Gunde (ቅ[ድ]ስት፡ ማርያም፡ ጉንዳጉ[ን]ዴ፡ [sic!]);
᾽Abäbu Səbḥat, her baptismal name being Wälättä ᾽Arägawi (f. 166r,5-1fb);

mods.identifier: HMML_216; ፻፸፫ [= 173] - f. Ir, upper margin, above the Gunda Gunde ownership note, written with a pencil on; C3-IV-77 (number provided by the Ethiopian Tourist Office) - on a small paper strip glued on f. 1r, lower margin

physicalDescription.form: Two wooden boards, covered with well preserved leather envelop on each of them, but torn on the back;
Heading decorations (harägs): ff. 1r, 47r, 54r, 94r, upper margin, 142r,4fb (end of Psalms), 157v,4fb (end of Canticles); f. Vv (rearguard): two unfinished and unskilled drawings of crosses;
